# PortalComponent.CrossingMode

**Enumeration**

Specifies the mode of crossing for a portal.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CrossingMode
```

## Overview

You pass this type to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/crossingMode-swift.property] to configure the portal component’s crossing feature.

Use [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/CrossingMode-swift.enum/disabled] to disallow contents within the portal to cross out of the portal boundary.

Use [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/CrossingMode-swift.enum/plane(_:)] to allow contents within the portal world with a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalCrossingComponent] to cross out of this planar definition of the portal boundary.

## Enumeration Cases

- **PortalComponent.CrossingMode.disabled**: Disallows contents within the portal to cross out of the portal boundary.
- **PortalComponent.CrossingMode.plane(_:)**: Allows contents within the portal to cross out of the portal along the provided plane.

## Conforms To

- Equatable

items.description: Allows contents within the portal to cross out of the portal along the provided plane.
